extendedInfo.description: Hi SMS Pro is an iPhone Style and Android Capability SMS app. Very cool UI  and easy to use. You can get the exciting iPhone Style and Android Capability SMS in Android Phone!Major Feature:- Support iPhone Style and message feature- Support message conversation- Support search in messages- Support MMS with picture,camera,video,audo,slideshow- Support forward,delete,copy messages- Support set SMS/MMS conversation limit- Support SMS/MMS deliver report- Support manage SIM card messages- Support more than 800 Emoji which is able to display in iPhone SMS and Go SMS- Support Fonts resize- Support transfer the apk to SD card- Support Delete all threads- Support popup window, directly reply and delete in popup window- Support Android 2.2 devices- Support Samsung Galaxy S4 and HTC One- Support 1080P resolution- Support iOS7 theme- Support forward function in popup window- No AdsGesture:- Support the gesture(slip from right to left) to delete the message in message listIf you meet any issue, pls don't just rate one star. We hope your email the issue to hidevstudio(at)gmail.com, we will definitely feedback and resolve your issue asap.Or follow usFacebook: https://www.facebook.com/HiDevStudioTwitter:https://twitter.com/hidevstudioLet's go to enjoy it!Tag: iPhone Style, SMS, MMS, Message, Emoji,iOS7, iOS 7,iOS 7 theme will come soon!You can get more iPhone Style and Android capability Apps in "Hi Dev Studio".Thanks!

reviews.title: S2
reviews.comment: Pretty much then same as the free version. But how do you change the name of the app to messages that was said it was possible inm the description. Then you\'ll get 5 stars.
reviews.author: Gerson Ruiz

reviews.title: It\'s ok
reviews.comment: Need to fix the time on the msgs sent and received. I get some odd times. Also, msgs are always out of order. I missed some messages because at first I didn\'t realize the incoming msg would show up a few msgs before my sent msg...hope this makes sense.
reviews.author: Laura C

reviews.title: Hi sms
reviews.comment: Keeps going back to stadard messaging and disapering from hi.launcher I have reinstall . Please fix
reviews.author: Dave Jeff

reviews.title: almost perfect
reviews.comment: love it but there is only one small issue. in the messages list it shows the last message with the wrong contact. for instance if i said hi to bob it would show \"hi\" under someone elses name but then when you click it, it shows all of the conversation correctly. the only time it shows it incorrectly is on the message list. and it does this all the time. i just ignore it but its kinda irritating after a while. please fix it if possible. thank you
reviews.author: Abby Esmonde

reviews.title: Okay excpet 2 things.
reviews.comment: This is a great messaging app, but doesn\'t like up my LED when I get a message, and does not alert me when I recieve an mms and doesn\'t let me send them. I have a galaxy s4.
reviews.author: Carter Lanzner

reviews.title: Great !!!!
reviews.comment: Great app. Does exactly what it should do in a awesome manner. Great app and great developer.
reviews.author: Joaquin Gomez

reviews.title: Good but needs some polishing
reviews.comment: 1) the popup is not iOS 7 themed 2) the notification icon needs to match the design of the app, or use something similar to stock. The icon at the moment is a bit of an eyesore Once these issues are addressed the app will be much more worth paying for
reviews.author: Francesco Rianjongdee

reviews.title: Grt
reviews.comment: Rating 5 star for ios7 update. Hi, expect same for all you pro apps. Timing or say schedule send option please as there in go sms....plll
reviews.author: Rajesh Patel

reviews.title: Bad
reviews.comment: Sorry I ever paid for this app its slow, shows my message notifications hours late and force closes constantly
reviews.author: Elliott Jerideau

reviews.title: I like it
reviews.comment: Can you add contact picture to the app
reviews.author: wuid marc Dormevil

reviews.title: Same issue
reviews.comment: the keyboard wont turn when you rotate the phone. it stays in the upright position. plz fix
reviews.author: Tajaun Mcfarland

reviews.title: Force-close
reviews.comment: It would be great if it didn\'t force-close after each message I send
reviews.author: Natalie Pineda

reviews.title: New update is fine but need colour change
reviews.comment: Hi SMS pro works fine but if u change the green colour into blue.. it would be perfect
reviews.author: Kanmani Subbu

reviews.title: Get rid of adds
reviews.comment: I paid for this version so I wouldn\'t have adds and they are still popping up. Please fix. Other then that I like this app.
reviews.author: Rebecca Sarabia

reviews.title: No alert
reviews.comment: This is a cool app no doubt but pls fix the alert, alert does not function.  If will disable the default sms, then hi sms does not receive the sms. Pls fix. Thanks
reviews.author: Arnel Pacia

reviews.title: Its decent
reviews.comment: Wont let me look at pics in messages please fix
reviews.author: Mayton Miller

reviews.title: No notifications
reviews.comment: Latest update still doesn\'t work. Doesn\'t notify when I get a text. Doesn\'t show up in my status bar & my phone doesn\'t go off. Pd for this app & it doesn\'t work.
reviews.author: Autum Bridges
